chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:
forall (xs : list entry) (i j : logIndex), removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs i) j = removeAfterIndex xs (Init.Nat.min i j)

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Module Nat := Struct Definition t : Set. Definition zero : nat. Definition one : nat. Definition two : nat. Definition succ : nat -> nat. Definition pred : nat -> nat. Definition add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition double : nat -> nat. Definition mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition sub : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition eqb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition leb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition ltb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition compare : nat -> nat -> comparison. Definition max : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition min : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition even : nat -> bool. Definition odd : nat -> bool. Definition pow : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_addmul : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
logIndex = nat : Set
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Notation min := Init.Nat.min
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Module Init := Struct Definition Unconvertible : forall A : Type, A -> A -> Set. Definition unconvertible : forall (A : Type) (a b : A), Unconvertible A a b -> unit. End 
removeAfterIndex_comm : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : logIndex), removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs i) j = removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs j) i
removeAfterIndex_le : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : nat), i <= j -> removeAfterIndex xs i = removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs j) i
removeAfterIndex_2_subseq : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : logIndex), subseq (removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs i) j) (removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs j) i)
removeAfterIndex_In_le : forall (xs : list entry) (i : logIndex) (x : entry), sorted xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i) -> eIndex x <= i
removeAfterIndex_le_In : forall (xs : list entry) (i : nat) (x : entry), eIndex x <= i -> In x xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i)
removeAfterIndex_covariant : forall (xs ys : list entry) (i : logIndex) (x : entry), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i) -> (forall x0 : entry, In x0 xs -> In x0 ys) -> In x (removeAfterIndex ys i)
removeAfterIndex_subseq : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), subseq (removeAfterIndex l i) l
removeAfterIndex_sorted : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), sorted l -> sorted (removeAfterIndex l i)
NoDup_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), NoDup l -> NoDup (removeAfterIndex l i)
removeAfterIndex_in : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (a : entry), In a (removeAfterIndex l i) -> In a l
uniqueIndices_elim_eq : forall (xs : list entry) (x y : entry), uniqueIndices xs -> In x xs -> In y xs -> eIndex x = eIndex y -> x = y
findAtIndex_index : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e' : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e' -> i = eIndex e'
subseq_subseq_eq : forall (A : Type) (xs ys : list A), subseq xs ys -> subseq ys xs -> xs = ys
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
findAtIndex_in : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e' : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e' -> In e' l
sorted_cons : forall (xs : list entry) (a : entry), sorted xs -> (forall a' : entry, In a' xs -> eIndex a > eIndex a' /\ eTerm a >= eTerm a') -> sorted (a :: xs)
NoDup_map_elim : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A) (x y : A), f x = f y -> NoDup (map f xs) -> In x xs -> In y xs -> x = y
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
subseq_NoDup : forall (A : Type) (ys xs : list A), subseq xs ys -> NoDup ys -> NoDup xs
sorted_subseq : forall ys xs : list entry, subseq xs ys -> sorted ys -> sorted xs
subseq_In : forall (A : Type) (ys xs : list A) (x : A), subseq xs ys -> In x xs -> In x ys
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
subseq = fix subseq (A : Type) (xs ys : list A) {struct ys} : Prop := match xs with | [] => True | x :: xs' => match ys with | [] => False | y :: ys' => x = y /\ subseq A xs' ys' \/ subseq A xs ys' end end : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop Arguments subseq {A}%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
execute_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (log : list entry) => execute_log' log init [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope
uniqueIndices = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) => NoDup (map eIndex xs) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments uniqueIndices {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (...

```coq
intros xs i j.
assert (i <= min i j \/ j <= min i j) as [H|H] by omega.
- rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := i) (j := min i j); auto.
  rewrite removeAfterIndex_comm with (i := min i j) (j := i); auto.
  rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := min i j) (j := i); auto.
- rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := j) (j := min i j); auto.
  rewrite removeAfterIndex_comm with (i := min i j) (j := j); auto.
  rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := min i j) (j := j); auto.
Qed.

original: intros xs i j. assert (i <= min i j \/ j <= min i j) as [H|H] by omega. - rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := i) (j := min i j); auto. rewrite removeAfterIndex_comm with (i := min i j) (j := i); auto. rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := min i j) (j := i); auto. - rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := j) (j := min i j); auto. rewrite removeAfterIndex_comm with (i := min i j) (j := j); auto. rewrite removeAfterIndex_le with (i := min i j) (j := j); auto.
